## Installation

You can install the development version of uscore like so:

``` r
remotes::install_github("probaverse/uscore")
```

## Example

Consider a numeric vector:

```{r}
library(uscore)
x <- c(0.3, 0.56, NA, 0.1, -12)
```

Uniform scores:

```{r}
uscore(x)
```

Normal scores:

```{r}
nscore(x)
```

Empirical return periods:

```{r}
rpscore(x)
```
